entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:37 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 9:37 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Light snow ending early in the evening then clearing. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h before morning. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 9:37 PM MST Wednesday 25 January 2023
